about_the_game:
World Horror Story is a cooperative survival horror game where you need to banish evil before it destroys you. In the game, you can communicate with ghosts and demons using voice, but be careful; if ghosts respond, it doesn't mean they are friendly.




Almost every town has its scary legends, passed down from generation to generation, but are they really just made up? You will explore the secrets of some urban legends and escape the evil that hides behind them. Discover stories inspired by the Blair Witch, Banshee, and other supernatural phenomena. You must banish the evil and save all the afflicted souls, but be careful, as you may become part of these terrifying legends if you fail to hide...


You will explore locations and lore, search for necessary items, and communicate with demons and ghosts. You can talk using your microphone and receive responses through a radio or a special board.


  • Cooperative mode;
  • Artificial intelligence that responds to you in real-time;
  • Multiple endings;
  • Terrifying atmosphere;
